card.name: Aku, Blue Sky Magnate
card.text: Flying, vigilance {2}{W}{U}: Create a 1/2 blue Bird creature token with flying, then draw a card. If you would draw a card while you control more creatures with flying than you have cards in your library, you win the game instead.

card.name: Abyxya, Danithra Baroness
card.text: {1}{U}{B}: Exile Abyxya from your hand with ten depth counters on it. Whenever a card is put into your graveyard from anywhere, remove a depth counter from Abyxya. When the last one is removed, you may cast Abyxya without paying its mana cost. During each of your turns, you may cast one card from your graveyard.

card.name: Saffrisa, Callous Empress
card.text: Whenever a permanent an opponent controls is dealt damage, destroy it. {2}{B}{R}: Exile target creature or planeswalker card from a graveyard. Create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a 2/2 black Zombie creature.

card.name: Dante, Ruler of Wintertide
card.text: Trample Dante's power is equal to the number of snow permanents you control. {1}{S}{S}{S}: Create Hreigr, the Blizzard's Maw, a legendary snow 4/4 red Dragon creature token with flying and haste.

card.name: Mikkino, Destined for Greatness
card.text: Vigilance When Mikkino enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. {4}{G}{W}: Create Azos's Spine, a legendary colorless Equipment artifact token with "Equipped creature gets +4/+4," "Whenever equipped creature attacks, exile target permanent defending player controls," and equip {5}. Attach it to Mikkino.

card.name: Rivha, His Impure Liege
card.text: Flying When Rivha enters the battlefield, return target creature card with mana value 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. Whenever Rivha attacks, sacrifice another attacking creature. If you do, create a white 3/3 Angel creature token with flying that's tapped and attacking.

card.name: Lady Ilyrana Jhalach
card.text: When Lady Ilyrana Jhalach enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 black and green Elf Archer creature tokens with reach. {G}, Tap an untapped Elf you control: Target Elf creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. {1}{B}, Tap two untapped Elves you control: Target non-Elf creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.

card.name: Am'atambi, Silken Poet
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, untap up to three target permanents. Whenever an opponent casts a permanent spell, you may pay its mana cost. If you do, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy. (The copy becomes a token.)

card.name: Giradrus, the Ashen Inferno
card.text: Flying, haste Whenever Giradrus attacks, draw a card, then you may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped and attacking. Exile that creature at end of combat unless it's a Dragon.

card.name: Qayim, God of Valor
card.text: Trample, lifelink, indestructible Qayim can't attack or block unless his power is 6 or greater. {1}{R}{W}: Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Headmaster Rudlington
card.text: Flash Headmaster Rudlington has hexproof as long as it's your turn. {X}: Choose a card with mana value X at random. You may cast a copy of that card without paying its mana cost. X can't be 0. (A copy of a permanent spell becomes a token.)

card.name: Sword of Heart and Soul
Blade Savant
card.text: When Blade Savant enters the battlefield, traverse Al Tabaq. (Planeswalk to Al Tabaq. If you're already there, cause {A}.) At the beginning of combat on your turn, target creature you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn. If that creature is equipped, it gains indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Armistice Enforcer
card.text: First strike Wanderlust — As long as you control four or more differently named lands, players can't draw more than one card each turn, and players can't cast more than one spell each turn.

card.name: Stalwart Stoat
card.text: Vigilance When Stalwart Stoat enters the battlefield, traverse Onora. (Planeswalk to Onora. If you're already there, cause {A}.) Spells that target cost {1} more to cast.

card.name: Archangel of Balance // Divine Compromise
card.text:
Flying When Archangel of Balance enters the battlefield, each player chooses a number of cards in their hand equal to the fewest number of cards in any player's hand, then discards the rest.
---
Exile target creature. Its controller draws a card. (Then exile this card. You may cast the creature later from exile.)

card.name: Crimson Rapture
card.text: Traverse Cirrusea, then destroy all creatures without flying. (Planeswalk to Cirrusea. If you're already there, cause {A}.)

card.name: Gallery of the Lost
card.text: Return up to three target creature cards with mana value X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield, then traverse Ghariv. Sacrifice those creatures at the beginning of the next end step. (Planeswalk to Ghariv. If you're already there, cause {A}.)

card.name: Graduate Student // Dissertation
card.text:
You have no maximum hand size. {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card unless you pay {2}.
---
Each player shuffles their hand and graveyard into their library, then draws seven cards. (Then exile this card. You may cast the creature later from exile.)

card.name: Berylscale Mimic
card.text: You may have Berylscale Mimic enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield, except it has "When this creature enters the battlefield, venture into Kahembo" and "{W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Berylscale Mimic becomes a copy of target creature and gains this ability."

card.name: Thunder Raptor
card.text: Flying When Thunder Raptor enters the battlefield, traverse Cirrusea. (Planeswalk to Cirrusea. If you're already there, cause {A}.) Other Birds you control get +2/+1.

Wanderlust — At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control four or more differently named lands, until end of turn target creature you control gets +1/+0 and can't be blocked.

card.name: Initiation Ritual
card.text: Search your library for a card, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library. Wanderlust — If you control four or more differently named lands, you may cast a card with mana value 4 or less from your hand by paying life equal to its mana value rather than paying its mana cost.

card.name: Tentaclysm
card.text: When Tentaclysm enters the battlefield, traverse Elmare. (Planeswalk to Elmare. If you're already there, cause {A}.) Whenever a card is put into your graveyard, create a 1/1 blue Tentacle creature token. This ability triggers only once each turn. Sacrifice eight Tentacles: Create an 8/8 blue Kraken creature token. card.name: Superconduct

card.text:

---

card.name: Chilling Constellation

card.name: Sleeping Cairn
card.text: Sleeping Cairn enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U} or {B}. {S}{S}: Until end of turn, Sleeping Cairn becomes a 3/3 blue and black Elemental creature with "Whenever this creature attacks or blocks, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card." It's still a land.

card.name: Ravaging Runes
card.text: Ravaging Runes enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B} or {R}. {1}{S}{S}: Until end of turn, Ravaging Runes becomes a 3/2 black and red Elemental creature with "When this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card." It's still a land.

card.name: Unshaken Oak
card.text: Unshaken Oak enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R} or {G}. {2}{S}{S}: Until end of turn, Unshaken Oak becomes a 5/4 red and green Elemental creature with "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to an opponent, it deals damage equal to its power to target planeswalker that player controls." It's still a land.

card.name: Lumbering Vale
card.text: Lumbering Vale enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G} or {W}. {1}{S}{S}: Until end of turn, Lumbering Vale becomes a 3/3 green and white Elemental creature with "Whenever this creature attacks or blocks, each other creature you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn." It's still a land.

card.name: Roaming Remains
card.text: Roaming Remains enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W} or {B}. {2}{S}{S}: Until end of turn, Roaming Remains becomes a 3/2 white and black Elemental creature with "Whenever this creature attacks or blocks, up to one other target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn." It's still a land.

card.name: Muckroot Falls
card.text: Muckroot Falls enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B} or {G}. {4}{S}: Until end of turn, Muckroot Falls becomes a 1/5 black and green Elemental creature with reach and "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player loses life equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard." It's still a land.

card.name: Glacial Wonder
card.text: Glacial Wonder enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G} or {U}. {3}{S}{S}: Until end of turn, Glacial Wonder becomes a 3/3 Elemental creature with hexproof and "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, untap each other land you control." It's still a land.

card.name: Spirit Valley
card.text: Spirit Valley enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U} or {R}. {1}{S}: Until end of turn, Spirit Valley becomes a 2/3 blue and red Elemental creature with "{UR}: Spirit Valley gets +1/-1 or -1/+1 until end of turn." It's still a land.

card.text: Sundering Terrain enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R} or {W}. {1}{S}{S}: Until end of turn, Sundering Terrain becomes a 4/2 red and white Elemental creature with first strike. It's still a land.
